data.text: Excellent location, spacious, confortable and very clean rooms. Amazing staff, extremely helpful for our first visit to Dubai. Special thanks to Anthony & Christma, our very helpful concierge. We will definitely come back next time we visit Dubai.
data.title: Great stay :-)

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Eliabeth,

Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your positive feedback about your recent stay with us. We are very happy to see that The St. Regis Downtown, Dubai Team met your expectations!
Our team will be pleased to read your wonderful compliments on the genuine hospitality provided by our associates. 
We invite you to contact us for your next stay to further our connection. This way, the team would be able to personally take care of your future reservations and ensure that you will have a flawless experience on your upcoming visit with us.
We are very much looking forward to welcoming you back on our property.

Warm regards,
The St. Regis Downtown Dubai Team
owner_response.author: St Regis

data.text:
A wonderful city hotel unfortunately let down by the worst service I have experienced in a five star hotel.
I can’t remember ever being somewhere so disorganized.  I attended the hotel for a conference, and upon arrival put my shirts in for laundry selecting the six hour option.  They came 24 hours later and only after I had to call three times and chase them down.  I therefore missed one morning of my conference.  Next up, I ordered room service before going to an important meeting.  They said 30 minutes.  I started chasing at 30 minutes and they kept telling me ‘two minutes’.  This went on for another 40 minutes, now 70 minutes after I ordered before I had to leave for my meeting having not eaten.  All in all just not good enough.  The general air is of a place where there is little discipline amongst the staff.  A shame, because the room and bathroom were beautiful.
data.title: Poor services, not customer focused

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. We appreciate you taking the time to leave genuine feedback about your recent experience with us. 

As we dedicate ourselves to ensuring each guest a memorable experience, your feedback serves as a great support to keep improving our hotel operations. Please accept our apology for not meeting your expectations during your stay. 

Rest assured that your constructive comments have been taken on board positively by the respective departments and we sincerely do apologize for any disappointment caused. 

Thank you once again for your genuine feedback and we hope we may welcome you back with us in order to demonstrate to deliver experiences up to your expectations.

Warm regards,
The St. Regis Downtown Dubai
owner_response.author: St Regis

data.text:
Upon arrival no normal warm St.Regis greetings , no welcome drink or cold towel not even a thank you for being a loyal member , basically a bunch of irritated looking staff members (possibly because they dont like living in dubai im not sure) anyhow i booked a Deluxe Suite which was just a large room , although the room is beautiful and well decorated the views were terrible and room has alot of street noise as well. 9/10 stays with Bonvoy im offered an upgrade here i was not which is fine. 

Breakfast is mediocre and i never even met my butler or had a welcome note or gift in my room , the best staff here are the door men and bell boys very nice and friendly, front desk staff and restaurant staff not so much big lack of training and customer service . For the price your paying Dubai has way more options from bonvoy available which will definitely appreciate your loyalty. I had come from Abu Dhabi St.regis before this stay and had an amazing warm stay which probably made this one seem even worse ,will not be back here again do not recommend it especially to gold or platinum members. 

Note that the location is excellent and the hotel is very well renovated and decorated which is such a shame considering the service provided.
data.title: Not a True St Regis Experience

data.text: I typically don't write reviews, but my recent stay at the St. Regis Downtown Dubai hotel left me no choice but to share my exceptional experience. The hotel boasts breathtaking views of the Dubai Canal, truly a sight to behold. The service exceeded my expectations at every turn, leading me to extend my initial one-night stay to several nights. A special shoutout to the Assistant Night Manager, Ahmed, who went above and beyond to make my stay unforgettable. Kudos to the entire team at St. Regis Downtown Dubai!
data.title: Exceptional Views! 🌟

data.text: Everything was amazing. Special S/O to Yusuf! The main reason I’m writing this review. Made sure me, my lady her friends & family were all taken care of. Food was amazing. Amenities was amazing. The beds were comfortable. Staff!! Definitely will come back. 10/10. Thank you again!
data.title: 10/10 Highly Recommended. Yusuf Thank You!
